Document.title: Lucy Robillard - Home
Document.description: My personal website where I have some of the projects I have done, some of my musical performances, and other things that I have done and created.
Document.body:
Welcome!

Hello, I'm Lucy. This is my personal website where you can find some of the things I have done and created. If you want to learn more about me, you can head over to About. If you want to see some of the projects I have done, head over to Projects. If you want to see some of my musical performances, head over to Music. I am a notary public in California, and if you want to know about my notary work, head over to Notary. If are an employer that might want to hire me, you can view my résumé over at Résumé.
